buccaneers hold off chiefs 3431 ap ap  the tampa bay buccaneers found a way to beat the kansas city chiefs they simply outscored them michael pittman scored one of his three touchdowns on a teamrecord 78yard run and tampa bay held off the chiefs 3431 sunday giving the bucs consecutive victories for just the second time since they won the super bowl two years ago

in a nailbiting contest the tampa bay buccaneers emerged victorious over the kansas city chiefs with michael pittman playing a crucial role in the buccaneers win pittman scored one of his three touchdowns on a 78yard run that helped the buccaneers maintain their lead over the chiefs
